website_summaries.verdict: Looks like a headband and performs for game day. Built to protect and perform naturally.
pros: We love that this headgear looks like a headband
More importantly, it protects from  heading the ball to unexpected falls
Head the ball with ease and also enjoy the warmth of this product in cold weather
cons: A bit slippery around the head when too hot

customer_reviews.title: Keeper tested Mother approved
customer_reviews.text: We purchased after my daughter suffered a concussion that kept her out 4 months. First game she was back, she got hit in the back of the head below her ponytail with a ball. The headgear protected the back of her head and cushioned the blow resulting in only temporary discomfort. She wears it every time she is on the field and is very comfortable. It looks like a headband so she is not self conscious about it. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would've had thought of this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 1/2 year old just suffered a concussion during indoor. She hit her head on the wall diving for a ball. I wish she would've had this on to soften the blow. I measured her head and she was exactly 22". I ordered her a size 4 and it fits snug but good! She hasn't worn it in a game yet but finds it comfortable and necessary! I will update this review after a few games.
customer_reviews.author: i love shopping!

customer_reviews.title: Sleek skull protection!
customer_reviews.text: Am 21 yo female, average size head I think. Measure about 21.5 and the size 3 fits quite tight, but think 4 may be too tight. I’ll be using it for figure skating and it’s not too bulky so can wear a hat over it! The material is also really nice it’s very dense and firm but has a slight give/squish to it. I hope I won’t need it, but in case I fall backwards I do think this will take most of the blow!
customer_reviews.author: Ange M

customer_reviews.title: Great headband
customer_reviews.text: This was a great alternative to making my daughter wear a helmet. She had a concussion and was really scared to go back into basketball. And when she played she was so afraid of hitting her head it effected her game. Once we got this for her you could tell that her confidence was back. She did fall many times the season she wore this but never re-injured her head. In fact, she said she was glad to have it on. I highly recommend kids wear this. It is light weight and looks like a headband.
customer_reviews.author: nickster

customer_reviews.title: but she does and feels comfortable and likes it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for granddaughter after she had a "minor" concussion playing high school soccer. After ten days, she is back on the field and wearing this head piece. Never thought she would wear it, but she does and feels comfortable and likes it. It gives her a more confident feeling. Makes the parents and grandparents feel more comfortable too. We realize this won't "prevent" a possible concussion from a "hard hit", but we think it will protect against regular impact.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, comfortable, looks good and therefore gets used.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter after a soccer concussion, (while using another guard). While I acknowledge guards can only mitigate injuries, this provides good coverage, and encourages good heading technique. More importantly it looks good and is comfortable to wear which means it gets used "always", practice and games. This guard is a measured fit, and so is comfortable. Unlike others which are "expandable one size fits all" that are tight, (especially band style).
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Best headgear for your soccer player
customer_reviews.text: 13 year old son wears it in goal and field. Looks good & is solid construction. This is the best protection available today that is functional, IMHO. It won't make you too hot, allows you to still head the ball, and looks good enough kids will wear it. Son is wearing biggest size right now (big kid) so not sure what to do if he keeps growing in a year or so. Storelli, consider adding a size 7?
customer_reviews.author: FrequentShopper

customer_reviews.title: We both feel better when she is practicing her figure skating moves now ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this for Ice Skating. We both feel better when she is practicing her figure skating moves now that she wears this. The ice is hard people.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Erb

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart doesn't account for all issues, but good product!
customer_reviews.text: We followed the guidelines for measuring the product with extreme precision. According to the size chart we fell barely into size 5 but not in size 4. However, when our daughter gets in a game and sweats the head band gets loose and falls off! However, this company stood behind their product and sent us a new one, great customer service and a quality made product!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sipe

customer_reviews.title: Measure carefully, not super stretchy, solid protection
customer_reviews.text: My six year old is very accident prone. We bought this for her to wear around the house and at the playground to protect her from further injury. She was able to wear it comfortably most of the day every day last week. It is not quite as soft or as squishy as I thought it would be, but it is comfortable to wear & she likes it. It has already saved her head twice - once from slipping in the hall & a second time when she fell forward on the seesaw.
customer_reviews.author: M. McClure

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: My head measured at about 22in, so I went with the size 4. It fit - it was hard to get over my head, but once it’s on, it almost feels too loose. I don’t think the fit was right, if I bent my head backwards, the whole headband would start to slide upwards. I also got this for lacrosse and I couldn’t fit my goggles over it without them overstretching and looking like they might rip. It would be fine for i.e. soccer. Protection wise, it felt like it would help take impact for falling backwards on your head or getting elbowed from the side.
customer_reviews.author: C Leo

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The Head Guard seems sturdy. If was easy to pick the size, thanks to the chart provided. Fits great! Hope it will protect the same way. Purchased for an ice skater, to protect from falls from doing jumps. If product doesn't withstand promises - I will update.
customer_reviews.author: no one but me

customer_reviews.title: Washes well and adds a layer of head protection during soccer
customer_reviews.text: Works great! If you are close to the next size up and still growing, go up. It fits snug until it's hot and sweaty and then my son needs to adjust it every once in a while. He still prefers the slightly larger size. Washes well in the washing machine too!
customer_reviews.author: Life Adventurist

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: May daughter suffered a concussion during soccer training and once she was cleared it was advised that she wear a concussion band. I did extensive research and quickly learned that Storelli was at the top of the list. My daughter now wears this for every training session and game. She tells me it is comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Grimjeeper77

customer_reviews.title: Order a smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I read tons of reviews prior to purchasing the headband. Most of them said that the headband ran large and that many people had to buy a smaller size. My son's head measured 22.5" which was at the top of a size 5 and the bottom of a size 6. He also has thick hair. So, I thought surely the size 5 would work. After 1 training session he said it was falling in his eyes the whole time. I then purchased a size 4 which was initially really tough for him to get on, but he says it's perfect once he starts sweating. The sizing is way off. Again, 22.5" head size should order a size 4 headband.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Klene

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly and was in better condition than expected...basically new in original box without wrappings. I purchased this head gear for ice figure skating and got a size 2 that is tight, but will not pop off during a fall and will stretch a little with use. I am mature female and my head is average size. This head guard is padded all the way around; protective of the temple and the lower back of head and especially works well with a pony tail. Not as protective as a helmet, but much less in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A.

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: When I first put it one it was very tight and I was going to return it. But after wearing it fit fine and I forgot that I was wearing it. Maybe the heat/sweat changed the shape of it.
customer_reviews.author: CZ4AGSR

customer_reviews.title: Try it on in a store before ordering.  Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size. Not easy to determine size even with precise measuring.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: very very comfortable because of the material that even when i'm sweating
customer_reviews.text: the head size chart is actually very accurate. been using it since the start of my second season as a goalie and just loves it. very very comfortable because of the material that even when i'm sweating, it doesn't keep my forehead moist with sweat but it wicks sweat away from my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Wailun E. Wong

customer_reviews.title: My son wears this whenever he plays soccer. If ...
customer_reviews.text: My son wears this whenever he plays soccer. If he plays for more than an hour and gets very hot and sweaty, the guard expands a bit and starts to slide around on his head, but he adjusts it and it doesn't bother him too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great headgear, but check the size.
customer_reviews.text: Great headgear, and the best protection you can get from a head-band style guard, but seems best for kids - the largest size they make is not large enough to fit my head.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit and Look
customer_reviews.text: Daughter used the head guard the next day. It was a perfect fit. No issues it being too loose and constantly adjusting it during the game.
customer_reviews.author: berto

customer_reviews.title: Great head protection
customer_reviews.text: My daughter incurred a concussion in soccer this last year and Being in sports medicine I opted to find her head protection from headers, falling, and collisions. It took her a little time to get used to it but it worked great and did not impede her playing ability and offered good head protection during the season. I would recommend this to other players that have had concussions from soccer/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Extra protection for sports and peace of mind for parents; anything to prevent a concussion for our children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable stays on easy
customer_reviews.text: Excellant. My 15 year old daughter wears for every soccer game. Comfortable stays on easy, and works. Have had a couple of months now and ordered a second for back up. Ordered original from Amazon, however size incorrect and not all sizes offered. Wound up returning and ordering directly from Storelli for size choice.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Fran

customer_reviews.title: Good product & delivery time
customer_reviews.text: Received this item fast just as advertised ! The first one I bought was a little big so I returned it & bought a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Used head band
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid for new head band and received a used one. The box was open and the tag was cut out of it and it was very obviously used.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Chiari malformation
customer_reviews.text: I dont have a skull in the back of my head and this gives me the security i need
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe add an XXL to the lineup.
customer_reviews.text: Got the extra large for my 14 year old daughter and it fits, but would never fit me. It's more comfortable for her than her previous Full 90 and seems to offer comparable protection. If you're male and have an above average sized head it probably wont work for you.
customer_reviews.author: R. Duck

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I take falls because of a balance ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I take falls because of a balance problem and was not looking forward to wearing a helmet...but I need to protect my head. This is solid but flexible. It looks like I am wearing a headband, so I am protected but do not feel self-conscious.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and fit well
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and fit well. This is a little extra protection from concussion!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sedlak

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So comfy for my 9year old keeper! Gives a little more peace of mind during tough games.
customer_reviews.author: pearly

customer_reviews.title: Which in my mind is better than none at all
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my daughter who needs some protection. Which in my mind is better than none at all. No device can make the player concussion proof.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing seems confusing, it is different on Amazon vs the company web site. Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Use your head, get these!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and good fit. Bought these for my young boys for playing indoor soccer. They do complain a bit about getting hotter with them, but that's a small price to pay for the extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: It works like a headband
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure head and get correct sizing. It works like a headband, and will take time getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: I use for work.
customer_reviews.text: I had a concussion at work and now I use this. I have to crawl underneath trucks and hats fall off when you go upside down, This works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy K

customer_reviews.title: Headband is great
customer_reviews.text: This headband is made well. It isn't nearly as bulky as some there are out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and works great. Saved her a few times already
customer_reviews.author: Shannon-Lee E.

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: Agree that sizing is a bit confusing. Guard fits a bit loose but manages to stay on with pony tail. Overall happy with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this one after a good amount of research
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and received promptly. Purchased this one after a good amount of research. Daughter wore the brand F90 during last season. This one is more confidence inspiring. Of course you never know how these do until one fails. Also important is that my daughter will wear this one, and it is readily washable. Make sure you read the sizing guide before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SeaFur

customer_reviews.title: Best Headguard
customer_reviews.text: Best headguard for girls soccer. Have tried other concussion bands; this one is far superior. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Head Guard!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it for soccer and said it’s very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: Head protection that won't hurt your wallet either
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sizing chart great quality materials better fit then full 90 premier and one piece design makes for a fantastic product
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable for her to wear the whole game and goes ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears this for soccer. It is comfortable for her to wear the whole game and goes on and off easily.
customer_reviews.author: J.V.

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection and is not too bulky
customer_reviews.text: After a concussion playing soccer, doctor recommended wearing headgear. Storelli provides good protection and is not too bulky. Looks the best out of all of the headgear I've seen. Measure head correctly for a good fit
customer_reviews.author: RS_2014

customer_reviews.title: Sizing hard to guess--even using guide.
customer_reviews.text: It was really difficult to size. Followed the directions specifically, and it was way too big. Now I am stuck with it because there is a "return window."
customer_reviews.author: Stacy J Swafford

customer_reviews.title: It’s HOT...but it protects the noggin!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint with this helmet is that my son complains it is very hot. It seems like there could have been some slits or holes in the fabric to allow it to vent better. I couldn’t find the size chart on Amazon, so I went to the manufacturer’s website to find the chart. For reference, I purchased a size 4 for my 14 year old son, who is a beanpole 5’7”. I was concerned that the school would not allow him to wear the helmet. I got it approved by the athletic director without any problems. The coach told me she wishes more kids would wear these!
customer_reviews.author: Calebmama

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter. She plays soccer and had two concussions in four months. She uses this every time she plays now and it works great for her- so far, so good. I would highly recommend this for players who need a bit of extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nothing offers complete protection but it is better to have some than none
customer_reviews.text: I used in for my 15year old soccer player after she took a hit that had to be glued shut. It seems to do what it says. It protects her head and reminds her to be careful. Nothing offers complete protection but it is better to have some than none. As long as your player does not become reckless it might be beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Storelli Head Guard- A Soccer Player's
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is required to wear head gear for soccer (which I love). She did have the headgear that has Velcro, but after trying and loving the Storelli shinguard's, I decided to buy the headgear when it went on sale. Best decision ever, my daughter only needs to readjust once or twice during a game, the other headgear she was readjusting every few minutes. Very comfortable and I feel safer that her head is protected.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L.

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Recent studies have revealed that heading a football would cause traumatic brain injury (TBI). Which can cause an organogenic case of depression, along with hormonal deficiencies later on in life. Im not sure this will prevent this from happening but logically it should and i do feel safer when going for aerial challenges. The weight is good, just be sure to get the right size. There is a sizing chart on their offical site.
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: built quality looks good.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it for soccer and I'm hoping it protects her nugget. Overall... built quality looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Adrenaline Junkeee

customer_reviews.title: Good protection.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Looks as thought it would protect well. There is no size adjustment and unfortunately it was a bit tight and had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: The size was wrong for my son and we both ...
customer_reviews.text: The size was wrong for my son and we both didn't care for how the padding was and the way it fit and really don't have a lot of protection for concussion guards.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps protect my daughter head while playing soccer when doing headers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wearing the head guard and it makes him feel more comfortable playing after a concussion.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Amazon, I feel comfortable with my kid doing activities without the risk of injury.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protection for injured area
customer_reviews.text: This headband has done what we hoped that it would do, which is to provide a layer of protection covering an injured area. Simple to where. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Landstrom

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a necessity after my daughter got a concussion playing futsol. The HeadGuard feels like an EvoShield for baseball and seems like it will help dramatically. I feel much better when she is on the field. It seems to run a little bit larger than I though, based on measurements, but she was on the small side of the listed range. It definitely takes some getting used to. I would recommend it to all parents who are concerned with the cumulative effects of contact to the head in sports.
customer_reviews.author: TommyD

customer_reviews.title: ... the right fit - this head guard is the best one around
customer_reviews.text: Provided you get the right fit - this head guard is the best one around. We have tried 2 others and this one is by far the most comfortable and protective
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Keeping his brain safe 💪
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about the fit. But its perfect and my son wears it for basketball too
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Fits g8
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Fits g8. I got this after a serious concussion playing soccer. I feel more confident with it on.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Head Gear
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this head gear. It fits much better than the Full 90 head gear. It doesn't shift and has great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Vic531

customer_reviews.title: much lighter and better padding.
customer_reviews.text: Use head guard to replace helmet while ice skating;much lighter and better padding.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Perry

customer_reviews.title: Storelli not reliable in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: So I have had multiple concussions playing rugby and am required to wear head protection for recreational soccer. I had previously used Full 90 headgear with great satisfaction. I find that the storeli headgear is greatly effected by temperature And is hard in cold weather and provides no protection to impact forces. I need to warm it up until it gets soft for it to be effective. I would not recommend this for playing soccer in 40-50 degree weather or keeping headgear in cold prior to games. I find the full 90 headgear more effective and I do not see stars when I head the ball with that protective garment.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Williams

customer_reviews.title: went by chart in advertisement and when item arrived it fit perfect. Product is doing what it is suppose to ...
customer_reviews.text: Head gear was bought for my youth playing soccer, went by chart in advertisement and when item arrived it fit perfect. Product is doing what it is suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Godinez Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well comfortable and provides a good range of protection
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A size larger than needed no adjustment but very well made shipped quickly
customer_reviews.author: louis bartell

customer_reviews.title: but he is use to wearing it and seems to be comfortable for him
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after my son had a seizure and fell and hit his head. he had a subarachnoid hemorrhage. i researched some protective head gear and this seemed to be the least confining and lightweight compared to a helmet. it offered as much protection on impact. we havent had a need to test it, but he is use to wearing it and seems to be comfortable for him. i told his Dr. about is and he asked me to bring it by for him to see. He said it may help some of his patients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service by seller and product is high quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: We got the size up and it was fine. If your child has a lot of hair
customer_reviews.text: It has a very snug fit. We measured our daughters head bought the size equivalent the size chart indicated. When the headgear arrived, it was too tight and gave her a bit of a headache right away. We got the size up and it was fine. If your child has a lot of hair, I would recommend going to the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Poole

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better fit than other headgear we have tried. Not quite as warm to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Fred smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She wears it on the field and even when she's playing goalie.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D. Todd

customer_reviews.title: This head gear does not adjust like the other concussion head gear
customer_reviews.text: This head gear does not adjust like the other concussion head gear, so it's very difficult to order just the right size. Was a bit big.
customer_reviews.author: LNC

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It did what it was supposed to; my daughter had a concussion, this was our answer, but she sai it was too loose...size down, too small..so we returned it and it was very eady to return.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley J. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: my son likes it and reports that it is comfortable and does occlude his field of vision
customer_reviews.text: He has already survived impacts to the head, my son likes it and reports that it is comfortable and does occlude his field of vision.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Great head gear!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why this is not rated 5 stars is because I think the sizing is a smidge off. It is a little tight on my son, and we ordered according to the sizing guidelines. He absolutely loves wearing this in his soccer games!
customer_reviews.author: Neighborhood house mom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit big for my daughter. Had to exchange for smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cummings

customer_reviews.title: and the black color not change easy with any scratch
customer_reviews.text: i thought its stronger, and the black color not change easy with any scratch , but its okay and good to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👏🏻🙌🏼
customer_reviews.text: got a size 4 and it works great just little big
customer_reviews.author: Rilee Rodman

customer_reviews.title: Inventory control device not removed.
customer_reviews.text: The item was received with the inventory control device attached and I will need to return it because there is no way to remove it. It is unfortunate because it was needed for two days from now.
customer_reviews.author: Fanama

customer_reviews.title: False sense of protection from concussion
customer_reviews.text: Lurchased for my daughter who plays basketball. She's bad three concussions. The doctor told me that it would not do anything to protect her. As a matter of fact it may actually knock her brain around more if she was hit wearing it. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: RVine

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought size 1 for my 2 year old late walker to protect his back head and forehead when he falls. It is thick enough and light weight. Size 1 was still a little big but wearable. I’ve tried size 2 for myself and it was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

product_meta.title: Storelli ExoShield Head Guard |Soccer Equipment & Head Injury Prevention |Ultra-Light Padded Headband|Sweat-Wicking|Black
product_meta.description: The ExoShield Head Guard is the preferred option from youth soccer clubs to the Premier League, intelligently designed to empower fearless headers, prevent cuts and bruises, and shut down distractions. WARNING AND DISCLAIMER: The Head Guard is designed to reduce the risks of cuts and impact to head during participation in soccer, but cannot and does not prevent all risk of head injuries. Participation in soccer and other sports exposes the participant to the risk of injuries, and participation in such sports implies acceptance of such risk. No helmet, head gear or head protection device can prevent all head, neck or facial injuries. A user may sustain head injuries (which may include concussions or other brain-related injuries) notwithstanding his or her use of the Head Guard, and there are areas of the head and face that are not covered or protected by the Head Guard. In addition, for maximum performance, the Head Guard must be sized and fitted properly, and replaced promptly if fit loosens over time or falls off during participation in soccer or other sports.
feature_bullets: #1 RATED SOCCER HEADGEAR: Rated as the #1 soccer head guard by Virginia Tech for reducing the risk of sports head injuries by an estimated 84%. Sleek yet heavy-duty design provides 360 degree impact protection from cuts, bruises, and contusions.

MILITARY-GRADE PROTECTION Armored with 9mm of combat-grade Team Wendy Zorbium foam used in U S Army Navy and Marine Corps helmets Engineered to reduce g-forces to the head by up to 50% Made stronger for safer soccer

ULTRALIGHT & ERGONOMIC Ultra-light at just 8 ounces headgear conforms to the head for optimal fit Perfectly suited to head the ball and accommodates short and long hair including pony tails Maximizes comfort without compromising performance
OFFICIAL HEADGEAR OF US CLUB SOCCER Official headgear of US Club Soccer used by goalkeepers and field players from youth leagues to the Premier League
FOLLOW SIZING GUIDE Refer to image with sizing chart (in carousel with product images) for instructions Please measure head circumference carefully to avoid mis-sizing
